title: 820-00239: Not recorgnizing ssd + critical update error on external storage
message:
Have this one that was sent in with the question mark folder. I was able to go into Recovery window and confirmed that the ssd wasn't being seen, only the portion that carriers the OS re-install file. While trying an external storage, it also won't load the OS, but gives the error about needing a critical update. 
I've tried powering the board with everything but just the display and then just external display with the same result. 

Any suggestions on where to start with his one?

title: 820-00239: Not recorgnizing ssd + critical update error on external storage
message:
Touchbar driver resides on internal SSD.
That's the reason of critical update error.
Check if J9600 has good contacts.

title: 820-00239: Not recorgnizing ssd + critical update error on external storage
message: Sorry for the late response on this. J9600 does have good contact

title: 820-00239: Not recorgnizing ssd + critical update error on external storage
message: Check SSD power rails and signals on the SSD side of J9600.
